sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"升起，举起"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: lift, hoist, raise, elevate, heave, boost
means: lift ： 指用人力或机械力把某物升到较高的位置。
hoist ： 多指用绳索、滑轮等机械把重物升起。
raise ： 较正式用词，常可与lift换用，但强调把某物举起或抬起到应有的高度。常用比喻。
elevate ： 较正式用词，指位置、高度的升高，多作比喻用，指职位、品德等的提高。
heave ： 指需花大力气或借外力才能举起或抬起重物。
boost ： 原义指从后面或下面推起或提高，现常用于指提高价格、振作精神等抽象概念。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"抛，投，掷"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: throw, cast, fling, heave, hurl, pitch, toss
means: throw ： 普通用词，使用广泛，仅指用力抛掷，不涉及动作方式或感情色彩。
cast常可与throw互换，指迅速扔出一个重量较轻的物体。
fling ： 指用力投掷，或因感情激动而粗暴地或漫无目的地扔东西。
heave ： 指把重物举起后扔出。
hurl ： 通常指用力投掷，动作迅猛，所投掷的距离也较远。
pitch ： 指随意地、轻轻地掷或扔，侧重方向性和有明确的目标。
toss ： 指无什么目的地、轻轻地、随意地掷或扔，所扔掷的东西一般都比较轻。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... heather 石南属 heave 举起 heaven 天堂.
石油词汇英语翻译(GH)--石油百科 ... heave to 逆风停船 heave 隆起 heaved block 脊状断块.
2011考研英语新增大纲词汇 - 豆丁网 ... harsh a. 严厉的，刺耳的 heave vt. （用力地）举起，抛 herb n. 药草，香草.
大学科技英语 ... rumbling： 隆隆声 heave： 起伏 imperceptible： 细微的.

jx.jx_cn_mean: 将引擎动力船向风停位：在与上条类似的境况中转动机动船，以便船首吃进水中同时以低速向前航行

jx.jx_en_mean: &I{Nautical} To turn a sailing ship so that its bow heads into the wind and the ship lies motionless except for drifting, in order to meet a storm
jx.jx_cn_mean: 将引擎动力船向风停位：在与上条类似的境况中转动机动船，以便船首吃进水中同时以低速向前航行

lj.lj_ly: they held out until a British fleet hove in sight.
lj.lj_ls: 他们一直坚持到一支英国舰队进入视野。

jx.jx_en_mean: To rise or seem to rise over the horizon into view, as a ship.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 看见，出现：出现或看上去要出现在地平线进入视野，如一条船

phrase.cizu_name: heave into sight 或 heave into view

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English hebban, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch heffen and German heben 'lift up'

entry.def: If you heave something heavy or difficult to move somewhere, you push, pull, or lift it using a lot of effort.

example.ex: It took five strong men to heave the statue up a ramp and lower it into place...
example.tran: 靠了5个强壮的男子才将雕像拉上坡道，再下放到合适的位置。

example.ex: He heaved Barney to his feet...

entry.def: If something heaves, it moves up and down with large regular movements.

example.ex: His chest heaved, and he took a deep breath.
example.tran: 他的胸脯上下起伏，然后他深深地吸了口气。

entry.def: If you heave, or if your stomach heaves, you vomit or feel sick.

example.ex: He gasped and heaved and vomited again...
example.tran: 他又开始又喘又吐起来。

example.ex: My stomach heaved and I felt sick.
example.tran: 我的胃翻腾起来，直想呕吐。

entry.def: If you heave a sigh, you give a big sigh.

example.ex: Mr Collier heaved a sigh and got to his feet.
example.tran: 科利尔先生深叹一口气，站了起来。

entry.def: If a place is heaving or if it is heaving with people, it is full of people.

example.ex: The Happy Bunny club was heaving...
Father Auberon's Academy Club positively heaved with dashing young men.
example.tran: 父亲奥伯龙的“学院俱乐部”里真的是有为青年济济一堂。

entry.def: When something heaves into view or heaves into sight, it appears.

example.ex: The train that now hove into view was clearly of a much older vintage.
example.tran: 现在进入视野的火车显然是一种古老得多的车型。

means.word_mean: 1. an upward movement (especially a rhythmical rising and falling);

sentences.sentence: "the heaving of waves on a rough sea"

means.word_mean: 3. the act of lifting something with great effort
4. an involuntary spasm of ineffectual vomiting;

sentences.sentence: "he responded with a lift of his eyebrow"
"fireman learn several different raises for getting ladders up"
"he was not good at heaving passes"

means.word_mean: 1. utter a sound, as with obvious effort;

sentences.sentence: "She heaved a deep sigh when she saw the list of things to do"

means.word_mean: 3. rise and move, as in waves or billows;
5. nautical: to move or cause to move in a specified way, direction, or position;
6. breathe noisily, as when one is exhausted;

sentences.sentence: "The runners reached the finish line, panting heavily"

means.word_mean: 7. bend out of shape, as under pressure or from heat;
8. make an unsuccessful effort to vomit; strain to vomit

auth_sentence.content: But it could be getting the heave-ho next year.
auth_sentence.res_content: But it could be getting the heave-ho next year.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But it could be getting the heave-ho next year.

auth_sentence.content: He saw...the ground begin to quake and heave.
auth_sentence.res_content: He saw...the ground begin to quake and heave.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He saw...the ground begin to quake and heave.

auth_sentence.content: We can hardly heave ourselves into the saddle.
auth_sentence.res_content: We can hardly heave ourselves into the saddle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We can hardly heave ourselves into the saddle.

means.word_mean: 举; 拉; 扔, 抛

sentences.en: The wave heaved the boat on land.
His stomach heaved at sight of the mess.

jushi.english: The old man's chest heaved alarmingly as he grasped for breath.
jushi.chinese: 这位老人喘气时,他的胸脯起伏得吓人。

jushi.english: The ground heaved from the earthquake.
jushi.chinese: 由于地震,地面凸起来了。

jushi.english: His stomach heaved at sight of the mess.
